definition: Organized gatherings or activities where people come together for a specific purpose or occasion.

positive_examples: The wedding ceremony brought together family and friends from across the country.
Our weekly team meeting helps coordinate project timelines and responsibilities.
The chess tournament attracted players of all skill levels to compete.
The graduation ceremony celebrated the achievements of hundreds of students.
They scheduled a board meeting to discuss the quarterly financial results.
The cooking contest featured amateur chefs showcasing their signature dishes.
negative_examples: She had a casual conversation with her neighbor over the fence.
He sent an angry email threatening to sue the company.
The children were playing together in the backyard without any structure.
They bumped into each other unexpectedly at the grocery store.
The argument between the siblings escalated quickly at dinner.
She gave him a friendly wave from across the street.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Conflict, Negotiation, Intimacy, Cooperation
